mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOOKMARK (BOOKMARK_NO, MEMBER_NO, TARGET_TYPE, TARGET_NO, BOOKMARK_DATE) VALUES (BOOKMARK_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{memberNo}, #{targetType}, #{targetNo}, SYSDATE)
mapper.select: SELECT b.TARGET_TYPE, b.TARGET_NO, b.BOOKMARK_DATE, CASE WHEN b.TARGET_TYPE = 'review' THEN r.REVIEW_TITLE ELSE f.POST_TITLE END AS title, CASE WHEN b.TARGET_TYPE = 'review' THEN r.WRITE_DATE ELSE f.WRITE_DATE END AS writeDate FROM BOOKMARK b LEFT JOIN REVIEW r ON b.TARGET_TYPE = 'review' AND b.TARGET_NO = r.REVIEW_NO LEFT JOIN FREE f ON b.TARGET_TYPE = 'community' AND b.TARGET_NO = f.POST_NO WHERE b.MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo} ORDER BY b.BOOKMARK_DATE DESC
SELECT ( NVL((SELECT COUNT(*) FROM FREE WHERE MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo} AND DELETE_YN = 'N'), 0) + NVL((SELECT COUNT(*) FROM REVIEW WHERE MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo} AND DELETE_YN = 'N'), 0) ) FROM DUAL
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BOOKMARK WHERE MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo}
